title: League Client Crashes
body:
Hello Riot,

I have been having this problem with your client where, I am in champion select and then "LOL Client Has Stopped Responding" and then I get punished for this. I have to sit here and waste my team for something that is not my fault at all. It gets me mad because then when I have an emergency or something and I really DO HAVE TO dodge, now I have strikes that I myself did not create and therefore they stack on my account making it worse for me. When will you guys fix this? I mean, I don't want my account to be banned (if it's possible through this) nor do I want to have a bad reputation for things I HAVE NOT done. Yes, I have tried reinstalling, Yes my computer is new, Yes it can run the game at max settings, Yes I have high speed internet. It is not a problem on my part, it is your client. It is a new bug that has been out for about 6 months (in my opinion) and it keeps getting worse. Every patch I hope that it is fixed, but no. That is all for now, I hope that you guys can fix this as soon as possible. Thank you.

replies.body:
Crashes during champ select are usually caused by your client dropping from the matchmaking service entirely. This is often the result of network settings that conflict with League, so I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are good.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

If it has been here for 6 months, do you really think it's the client's fault? Stop playing ranked until it's properly fixed. You are punishing yourself and other players for no reason. You won't get banned, just endless queue dodging and LeaverBuster punishement.
Try the Riot automated tool:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

Do you remember what changed 6 months ago? new pc? driver?
